penfactory

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • penfactory.GUI

  • public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates and displays the GUI for the Warehouse Management software. Enables the user to search through all properties of the products in the database

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Assortment assortment
      The connection to the database functionality
      (package private) javax.swing.JLabel autoSaveLocation
      Displays the path where the automatic save file is located
      (package private) javax.swing.JButton btnAddProduct
      The button to open the pop-up-window for adding new products
      (package private) javax.swing.JButton btnLoad
      The button to load a saved database from the file specified by the textFieldLoad
      (package private) javax.swing.JButton btnRemoveAllProducts
      The button to delete all products from a category
      (package private) javax.swing.JButton btnRemoveProduct
      The button to remove all selected products
      (package private) javax.swing.JButton btnRemoveProductInstances
      The button to add or remove instances from one product The product is defined by the selection(only ONE selection is possible)
      (package private) javax.swing.JButton btnSave
      The button to save the current database to the file specified by the textFieldSave
      (package private) javax.swing.JFrame frame
      The frame for the main-window
      (package private) javax.swing.JLabel labelSearchFor
      The label which indicates that the search term should be entered in the text-field nearby

      Used for searching in the database

      The scroll-panel in which the table is integrated
      (package private) javax.swing.JSpinner spinnerRemoveProductInstances
      The spinner which shows how many products should be removed or added negative - amount will be removed positive - amount will be added

      The table which displays the database to the user

      The database to store all products and their properties
